title: About Me
name: Konstantin Shenderov
positionName: Test Automation Engineer and Full Stack Developer
description: Hello, I am Konstantin Shenderov, an ISTQB Certified Test Automation Engineer and Full Stack Developer from Winnipeg, Canada. The seven years of experience in software, hardware, and firmware testing, combined with a strong background in full stack web development, has enabled me to develop and create unique test automation solutions using a wide range of tools. My expertise ranges from software testing and QA automation to full stack, back-end, and front-end development.
